title: ðŸš¨Panthers hire Matt Rhule as head coach - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/7)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and CBS Sports college football writer and host of the 'Cover 3' podcast, Chip Patterson, to react to the Panthers' surprise hiring of Matt Rhule as the organization's next head coach. First, Chip breaks down Rhule's reputation in the college ranks and why he has been such a hot candidate in the NFL. Then the guys discuss how much of a shock this move was, the success rate of college coaches making the leap, what the Panthers will do with Cam Newton now and much more!
NOTE: News of the Giants hiring Joe Judge as their head coach broke during the recording of this podcast.
